verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) <S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? Wilt Thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> me <S%H5331>forever<s%>? <S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> wilt Thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me?

<S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall I <S%H7896>take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> [Having] <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> all the <S%H3119>day<s%>? <S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will my <S%H340>enemy<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me?

<S%H5027>Consider<s%> [and] <S%H6030>answer<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H215>Enlighten<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H3462>sleep<s%> the [sleep of] <S%H4194>death,<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> my <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "I have <S%H3201>overcome<s%> him," [Lest] my <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I am <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
But I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness;<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in Thy <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> He has <S%H1580>dealt<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with me.
